availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, painter. Native of Leicestershire, England. Married to Rebecca Skerritt. Father of Therese Skerritt, Rebecca Skerritt, Curtis Skerritt, Elizabeth Skerritt, and Harry Skerritt. Painter in Middlesex, England, in 1851. Painter in Hopkinsville, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Hopkinsville, p. 684.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Hopkinsville, p. 395B.
1851 England Census, Middlesex, Marylebone Registration District, Rectory Sub-registration District, Enumeration District 14, England, The National Archives of the UK (Kew, Surrey, England), Class HO107, piece 1488, folio 744, roll: 87814, page 17.
